unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The code and scheme for the unit in which the weight is specified.

SimpleUnit.title: Simple Unit
SimpleUnit.description: A simple unit of measure, consisting of: an identifier for the list (scheme) from which the unit is taken, and an identifier for the unit from that list.

scheme.title: Scheme
scheme.description: The list from which identifiers for units of measure are taken, using the open [unitClassificationScheme](https://standard.open-contracting.org/{{version}}/{{lang}}/schema/codelists/#unit-classification-scheme) codelist. 'UNCEFACT' is recommended.

id.title: ID
id.description: The identifier from the codelist referenced in the `scheme` field. Check the [unitClassificationScheme](https://standard.open-contracting.org/{{version}}/{{lang}}/schema/codelists/#unit-classification-scheme) codelist for details of how to find and use identifiers from the scheme in use.

Container.title: Container
Container.description: Describe the container in which the medicine is contained and its storage capacity. Also known as: presentation, presentation form, package.

name.title: Container Name
name.description: The name of the container, from the container codelist.

capacity.title: Container Capacity
capacity.description: The storage capacity of the container, in number of units and their unit code.

ActiveIngredient.title: Active Ingredient
ActiveIngredient.description: Describe an active ingredient, typically chemical compounds or biologic substances.

name.title: Active Ingredient Name
name.description: The name of the active ingredient. It refers to the generic name as in the International Common Denomination (INN). This field is the same as the 'name' attribute in the ATC standard. Also known as: generic name, drug, substance name, active substance.

dosage.title: Active Ingredient Dosage
dosage.description: Describe the dosage of the active ingredient for the drug, in number of units and their unit code. Also known as: concentration, potency.

activeIngredients.title: Active Ingredients
activeIngredients.description: An array of active ingredients, typically chemical compounds or biologic substances.

dosageForm.title: Dosage Form
dosageForm.description: A dosage form in which this medicine is available, from the dosageForm codelist.

administrationRoute.title: Administration Route
administrationRoute.description: A route by which this medicine can be given, from the administrationRoute codelist.

container.title: Container
container.description: Describe the container in which the medicine is contained and its storage capacity. Also known as: presentation, presentation form, package.
